author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
“Although both whales were fit and healthy, they were in quite a predicament this close to shore, away from their migration route. That is, until the pod of dolphins came to the rescue and began to lead them back to shore.”
Am I the only one confused by this paragraph? Why did they lead them back to shore?

author: Peter Wright
content:
Make sure you click on the blue bold link “video of the moment was shared on social media”.

It makes you aware that we humans are actually not as smart as we think we are or as high up the food chain.

Awesome, it makes you very emotional.
